00016 #ifndef __USBHW_H__
00017 #define __USBHW_H__
00018 
00019 
00020 /* USB RAM Definitions */
00021 #define USB_RAM_ADR     0x7FD00000  /* USB RAM Start Address */
00022 #define USB_RAM_SZ      0x00002000  /* USB RAM Size (8kB) */
00023 
00024 /* DMA Endpoint Descriptors */
00025 #define DD_NISO_CNT             16  /* Non-Iso EP DMA Descr. Count (max. 32) */
00026 #define DD_ISO_CNT               8  /* Iso EP DMA Descriptor Count (max. 32) */
00027 #define DD_NISO_SZ    (DD_NISO_CNT * 16)    /* Non-Iso DMA Descr. Size */
00028 #define DD_ISO_SZ     (DD_ISO_CNT  * 20)    /* Iso DMA Descriptor Size */
00029 #define DD_NISO_ADR   (USB_RAM_ADR + 128)   /* Non-Iso DMA Descr. Address */
00030 #define DD_ISO_ADR    (DD_NISO_ADR + DD_NISO_SZ) /* Iso DMA Descr. Address */
00031 #define DD_SZ                 (128 + DD_NISO_SZ + DD_ISO_SZ) /* Descr. Size */
00032 
00033 /* DMA Buffer Memory Definitions */
00034 #define DMA_BUF_ADR   (USB_RAM_ADR + DD_SZ) /* DMA Buffer Start Address */
00035 #define DMA_BUF_SZ    (USB_RAM_SZ  - DD_SZ) /* DMA Buffer Size */
00036 
00037 /* USB Error Codes */
00038 #define USB_ERR_PID         0x0001  /* PID Error */
00039 #define USB_ERR_UEPKT       0x0002  /* Unexpected Packet */
00040 #define USB_ERR_DCRC        0x0004  /* Data CRC Error */
00041 #define USB_ERR_TIMOUT      0x0008  /* Bus Time-out Error */
00042 #define USB_ERR_EOP         0x0010  /* End of Packet Error */
00043 #define USB_ERR_B_OVRN      0x0020  /* Buffer Overrun */
00044 #define USB_ERR_BTSTF       0x0040  /* Bit Stuff Error */
00045 #define USB_ERR_TGL         0x0080  /* Toggle Bit Error */
00046 
00047 /* USB DMA Status Codes */
00048 #define USB_DMA_INVALID     0x0000  /* DMA Invalid - Not Configured */
00049 #define USB_DMA_IDLE        0x0001  /* DMA Idle - Waiting for Trigger */
00050 #define USB_DMA_BUSY        0x0002  /* DMA Busy - Transfer in progress */
00051 #define USB_DMA_DONE        0x0003  /* DMA Transfer Done (no Errors)*/
00052 #define USB_DMA_OVER_RUN    0x0004  /* Data Over Run */
00053 #define USB_DMA_UNDER_RUN   0x0005  /* Data Under Run (Short Packet) */
00054 #define USB_DMA_ERROR       0x0006  /* Error */
00055 #define USB_DMA_UNKNOWN     0xFFFF  /* Unknown State */
00056 
00057 /* USB DMA Descriptor */
00058 typedef struct _USB_DMA_DESCRIPTOR {
00059   DWORD BufAdr;                     /* DMA Buffer Address */
00060   WORD  BufLen;                     /* DMA Buffer Length */
00061   WORD  MaxSize;                    /* Maximum Packet Size */
00062   DWORD InfoAdr;                    /* Packet Info Memory Address */
00063   union {                           /* DMA Configuration */
00064     struct {
00065       DWORD Link   : 1;             /* Link to existing Descriptors */
00066       DWORD IsoEP  : 1;             /* Isonchronous Endpoint */
00067       DWORD ATLE   : 1;             /* ATLE (Auto Transfer Length Extract) */
00068       DWORD Rsrvd  : 5;             /* Reserved */
00069       DWORD LenPos : 8;             /* Length Position (ATLE) */
00070     } Type;
00071     DWORD Val;
00072   } Cfg;
00073 } USB_DMA_DESCRIPTOR;
00074 
00075 /* USB Hardware Functions */
00076 extern void  USB_Init       (void);
00077 extern void  USB_Connect    (BOOL  con);
00078 extern void  USB_Reset      (void);
00079 extern void  USB_Suspend    (void);
00080 extern void  USB_Resume     (void);
00081 extern void  USB_WakeUp     (void);
00082 extern void  USB_WakeUpCfg  (BOOL  cfg);
00083 extern void  USB_SetAddress (DWORD adr);
00084 extern void  USB_Configure  (BOOL  cfg);
00085 extern void  USB_ConfigEP   (USB_ENDPOINT_DESCRIPTOR *pEPD);
00086 extern void  USB_DirCtrlEP  (DWORD dir);
00087 extern void  USB_EnableEP   (DWORD EPNum);
00088 extern void  USB_DisableEP  (DWORD EPNum);
00089 extern void  USB_ResetEP    (DWORD EPNum);
00090 extern void  USB_SetStallEP (DWORD EPNum);
00091 extern void  USB_ClrStallEP (DWORD EPNum);
00092 extern DWORD USB_ReadEP     (DWORD EPNum, BYTE *pData);
00093 extern DWORD USB_WriteEP    (DWORD EPNum, BYTE *pData, DWORD cnt);
00094 extern BOOL  USB_DMA_Setup  (DWORD EPNum, USB_DMA_DESCRIPTOR *pDD);
00095 extern void  USB_DMA_Enable (DWORD EPNum);
00096 extern void  USB_DMA_Disable(DWORD EPNum);
00097 extern DWORD USB_DMA_Status (DWORD EPNum);
00098 extern DWORD USB_DMA_BufAdr (DWORD EPNum);
00099 extern DWORD USB_DMA_BufCnt (DWORD EPNum);
00100 extern DWORD USB_GetFrame   (void);
00101 extern void  USB_ISR        (void) __irq;

00103 
00104 #endif  /* __USBHW_H__ */
